snippet.title: Pirates Of Pangea—Backstory Trailer (Multiplayer Open Sea Survival Game based on Bermuda Triangle)
snippet.description:
Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2168260/Pirates_Of_Pangea__Land__Sea_Survival/
This is the trailer for the upcoming open sea survival game "Pirates of Pangea" based on the mystery of the Bermuda Triangle. You are lost in the Bermuda triangle and your goal is to find a way home while facing myriad challenges and fierce enemies, both at sea and on land. Survive hostile conditions, live off the land, build a base, build a seaport, establish trade routes and more!

visit http://www.PiratesOfPangea.com to sign up for early access.
visit https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AkuIxt3I2Gg for extended gameplay overview

Credits:
Music by Flute Cafe (http://youtube.com/theflutecafe)
If you enjoyed the music, please subscribe to Flute Cafe.
